name: Volkyri Aesthetic EDIT
description: Transform images into ancient starfaring warrior-attendants from the Hel Vortex system - asymmetrical half-horn, metallic bodysuits, martial elegance
templates: Using the provided image, transform the subject into a Volkyri {role}. Add {horn_description}. Change attire to {primary_metal} metallic bodysuit with {accent_color} accent panels. Apply {expression}. {lighting}. {style_tag}. {preservation}.

Using the provided image, restyle with Volkyri aesthetic: add {horn_description} to the subject. Transform clothing into form-fitting {primary_metal} armor with {accent_color} trim. Apply {expression} to the features. {lighting}. {skin_treatment}. {style_tag}. {preservation}.

Transform this image into Volkyri warrior-attendant style. Add {horn_shape} half-horn {horn_origin}, {horn_metal} sheathing catching light. Change outfit to {primary_metal} reflective bodysuit with {accent_color} accents. Apply {expression}. {lighting}. {style_tag}. {preservation}.

Using the provided image, apply Hel Vortex transformation: add {horn_description} to the subject's temple. Restyle attire as {primary_metal} metallic bodysuit with {accent_color} chest panel. Transform expression to {expression}. {lighting}. {skin_treatment}. {style_tag}. {preservation}.

Restyle this image with Volkyri martial elegance. Add asymmetrical {horn_shape} horn {horn_origin} with {horn_metal} plating. Transform clothing to {primary_metal} metallic attire with {accent_color} accents. Apply {expression}. {lighting}. {style_tag}. {preservation}.

Transform the subject into a Volkyri {role} from the Hel Vortex system. Add {horn_description}. Change attire to {primary_metal} armor with {accent_color} trim. Modify complexion to {skin_treatment}. Apply {expression}. {lighting}. {style_tag}. {preservation}.

horn_description: single half-horn growing from left temple in swept-blade shape with polished metal sheathing
single half-horn growing from right temple in swept-blade shape, chrome-sheathed bone
asymmetrical half-horn emerging from left skull, conical spire variant with gunmetal plating
single conical spire horn fused to right temple, bone ridges visible at skull fusion point
half-horn of geometric plated design growing from left temple, angular faceted segments
right-temple mounted geometric horn with crystalline metal sheathing, bone fused to skull
single flame-swept horn curving from left temple in graceful S-curve, golden metal sheath
flame-swept half-horn emerging from right skull, flowing frozen-fire shape with chrome finish
spiral-twist horn growing from left temple, elegant helical form with ceremonial metal bands
single spiral horn fused to right temple, bone structure visible beneath silver plating
curved-talon half-horn emerging from left skull, smooth predatory curve with dark metal sheath
right-temple curved-talon horn, single backward sweep like obsidian claw fused to bone
expression: cold assessment with superior gaze evaluating all before her
subtle menace with slight smile suggesting imminent danger
regal composure, neutral and dignified, utterly unreadable
fierce focus with intense concentration betraying combat readiness
glacial serenity with absolute calm masking violence beneath
proud defiance with chin raised and unwavering resolve
cold assessment as eyes scan surroundings
regal composure befitting ancient warrior nobility
fierce focus locked on unseen threat
proud defiance etched into angular features
skin_treatment: pale porcelain skin contrasting dark attire
pale skin with subtle blue undertones
ivory skin luminous against dark armor
deathly pale complexion with striking contrast
lighting: Apply dramatic rim lighting catching every metallic surface
Add single harsh key light carving deep shadows across angular features
Transform lighting with purple accent gel for otherworldly atmosphere
Apply twilight ambience with metallic highlights
Add harsh directional light suggesting dying suns
Apply strong underlighting creating dramatic upward shadows
Add specular highlights dancing across chrome and polished metal
Apply crimson accent lighting with molten background glow
Add cool blue rim light separating figure from void darkness
Apply multiple stellar light sources casting overlapping warm shadows
Add harsh overhead lighting with deep eye shadows
Apply side lighting emphasizing horn asymmetry
